message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do a bit better than $90, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm not willing to go much lower than $105, Bob. But I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and $98, so how about $101.50? That's my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $99. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I've already given you a great deal, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $101.50. I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying the product. If you're not willing to meet me at $101.50, I'm going to have to consider other options.
I understand you're trying to make a sale, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $100. That's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
